column4: sometimes when i am just on the internet or doing something miscellaneous, my system gets VERY slow as if something huge is running.  any reason why?
and my fan goes crazy
yes it does
and i see my network history usage spike
but i barely did ANYTHING
i wonder if i an a guinea pig for 7.10 gusty
I feel the same darn way, i cant do crap, and i dont know whats wrong
i would say so, because all 7.10 has brought me is nothing but anger and a screwed up OS
what version did you have before gusty
7.04,went to upgrade to 7.10 upgrade failed, OS got bent over =\
did you like 7.04
yeah, but i wanted to get 7.10 because it had supported desktop effects and such, along with more security and stuff :P
i think they will fix the bugs though
thats nice, but i dont have a computer now =\
nothing works?
nothing works, when i boot up it hits loading screen, after that it just fails, and restarts
so now im just going to try and backup my data with 7.10 LiveCD, but it wont even work
what is the biggest concern right n ow
my data on my hard drive, if i can get that back ill just go back to 7.04 or XP because this has just been hell
no one here can help you?

most likely not, i have had at minimum 4-5 people help me, i have been reading the forums for about 3 days, and i have found nothing, im just about ready to throw the damn thing into my burn pit and light er up
maybe you can send wirechief a message
lol, i have no errors to give him because i dont receive any =\
did you do a md5sum on your gusty download?
